com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Class AncillaryFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.AncillaryFile
  • public class AncillaryFile extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing ancillary file associated with an asset. Ancillary files are downloaded alongside the asset segments.
    • Fields

      An array of tags which can be used for managing files.

    • Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AncillaryFile 
      AncillaryFile(java.net.URL src, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String[] tags)
      Constructor taking the source URL, a description, and any String tags which can be used for management of the files.
      public AncillaryFile(java.net.URL src, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String[] tags)
      Constructor taking the source URL, a description, and any String tags which can be used for management of the files. Files created using this constructor will be stored within a folder within the same location as the segment files.
      Parameters:
      src - The source URL.
      description - A description.
      tags - A string array containing tags for the file.
      AncillaryFile 
      AncillaryFile(java.net.URL src, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String[] tags, java.lang.String path)
      Constructor taking the source URL, a description, any tags used for management of the files, and also a local path for where the additional files should be stored.
      public AncillaryFile(java.net.URL src, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String[] tags, java.lang.String path)
      Constructor taking the source URL, a description, any tags used for management of the files, and also a local path for where the additional files should be stored.
      Parameters:
      src - The source URL.
      description - A description.
      tags - A string array containing tags for the file.
      path - The local path for where the file should be saved. Must be a valid local path.
